public ref class Enumerable abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组用于查询实现 的对象的 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）方法。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying objects that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类中的方法提供了标准查询运算符的实现, 用于查询实现的数据源。The methods in this class provide an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 标准查询运算符是遵循模式的常规用途方法, [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]使您能够对任何中的数据进行遍历、筛选和投影操作。基于网络的编程语言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 此类中的大多数方法都定义为扩展方法。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend . 这意味着, 可以像调用实现的任何对象上的实例方法一样调用它们。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 在枚举查询对象之前, 在返回值序列的查询中使用的方法不会使用目标数据。Methods that are used in a query that returns a sequence of values do not consume the target data until the query object is enumerated. 这称为 "延迟执行"。This is known as deferred execution. 在返回单一实例值的查询中使用的方法将立即执行并使用目标数据。Methods that are used in a query that returns a singleton value execute and consume the target data immediately.

span.span: Standard Query Operators Overview

related.span: 扩展方法（C# 编程指南）

span.span: Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)
Extension Methods (Visual Basic)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可以简单地对值序列执行计算。The method makes it simple to perform a calculation over a sequence of values. 此方法的工作方式`func`是对中`source`的每个元素调用一次, 但第一个元素除外。This method works by calling `func` one time for each element in `source` except the first one. 每次`func`调用时, 都会同时传递序列中的元素和聚合值 ( `func`作为的第一个参数)。Each time `func` is called, passes both the element from the sequence and an aggregated value (as the first argument to `func`). 的第一个元素`source`用作初始聚合值。The first element of `source` is used as the initial aggregate value. 替换上一个`func`聚合值的结果。The result of `func` replaces the previous aggregated value. 返回最终结果`func`。 returns the final result of `func`. 此方法的重载不适用于所有情况, 因为它使用的第一个`source`元素作为初始聚合值。This overload of the method isn't suitable for all cases because it uses the first element of `source` as the initial aggregate value. 如果返回值仅应包含符合特定条件的元素`source` , 则应选择另一个重载。You should choose another overload if the return value should include only the elements of `source` that meet a certain condition. 例如, 如果要计算中`source`偶数的总和, 此重载并不可靠。For example, this overload isn't reliable if you want to calculate the sum of the even numbers in `source`. 如果第一个元素是奇数而不是偶数, 则结果将不正确。The result will be incorrect if the first element is odd instead of even. 为了简化常见聚合运算, 标准查询运算符还包括常规用途计数方法、和四个数字聚合方法, 即 、、和。To simplify common aggregation operations, the standard query operators also include a general purpose count method, , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用反转字符串中单词的顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to reverse the order of words in a string by using . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法不返回集合的所有元素。This method does not return all the elements of a collection. 相反, 它确定集合的所有元素是否都满足条件。Instead, it determines whether all the elements of a collection satisfy a condition. 一旦可以确定`source`结果, 就会立即停止的枚举。The enumeration of `source` is stopped as soon as the result can be determined. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中, `Aggregate Into All()`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into All()` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来确定序列中的所有元素是否都满足条件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine whether all the elements in a sequence satisfy a condition. 如果`allStartWithB`所有宠物名称以 "B" 开头或`pets`数组为空, 则变量为 true。Variable `allStartWithB` is true if all the pet names start with "B" or if the `pets` array is empty. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#4)] 方法返回的布尔值通常用于`where`子句的谓词 (`Where` Visual Basic 中的子句) 或对方法的直接调用。The Boolean value that the method returns is typically used in the predicate of a `where` clause (`Where` clause in Visual Basic) or a direct call to the method. 下面的示例演示如何使用`All`方法。The following example demonstrates this use of the `All` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了 `source`从实现自身的类型更改的编译时类型外,此方法不会产生任何影响。The method has no effect other than to change the compile-time type of `source` from a type that implements to itself. 当序列实现但还具有一组不同的公共查询方法时, 可以使用来在查询实现之间进行选择。 can be used to choose between query implementations when a sequence implements but also has a different set of public query methods available. 例如`Table` , 给定一个实现并具有自己的方法 (如`Where`、 `Select`和`SelectMany`) 的泛型类, 调用`Where`将调用的公共`Where`方法`Table`.For example, given a generic class `Table` that implements and has its own methods such as `Where`, `Select`, and `SelectMany`, a call to `Where` would invoke the public `Where` method of `Table`. 表示数据库表的`Where` 类型可以有一个方法,该方法采用谓词参数作为表达式树,并将树转换为SQL以进行远程执行。`Table`A `Table` type that represents a database table could have a `Where` method that takes the predicate argument as an expression tree and converts the tree to SQL for remote execution. 如果不需要远程执行 (例如因为谓词调用了本地方法), 则可以使用方法隐藏自定义方法, 并改为提供标准查询运算符。If remote execution is not desired, for example because the predicate invokes a local method, the method can be used to hide the custom methods and instead make the standard query operators available. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示当需要标准查询运算符实现时, 如何`Where`使用隐藏类型的自定义方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use to hide a type's custom `Where` method when the standard query operator implementation is desired. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#108)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#108)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法通过提供必要的类型信息, 对非泛型集合调用标准查询运算符。The method enables the standard query operators to be invoked on non-generic collections by supplying the necessary type information. 例如, 不实现 ,但通过对对象调用, 然后可以使用标准查询运算符来查询序列。For example, does not implement , but by calling on the object, the standard query operators can then be used to query the sequence. 如果元素无法转换为类型`TResult`, 则此方法将引发。If an element cannot be converted to type `TResult`, this method throws a . 此方法的源序列为, 这意味着元素具有的编译时静态`object`类型。The source sequence for this method is , which means the elements have the compile-time static type of `object`. 此方法执行的唯一类型转换是引用转换和取消装箱转换。The only type conversions that are performed by this method are reference conversions and unboxing conversions. 集合中元素的运行时类型必须与目标类型匹配, 或者, 对于值类型, 元素的运行时类型必须是目标类型的装箱转换的结果。The runtime type of the elements in the collection must match the target type, or in the case of value types, the runtime type of elements must be the result of a boxing conversion of the target type. 不允许使用其他转换类型, 如不同数值类型之间的转换类型。Other conversion types, such as those between different numeric types, are not allowed. 若要仅获取可以转换为类型`TResult`的元素, 请使用方法而不是。To obtain only those elements that can be converted to type `TResult`, use the method instead of . 在查询表达式中, 显式类型迭代变量转换为对的调用。In a query expression, an explicitly typed iteration variable translates to an invocation of . 此示例演示显式类型化范围变量的语法。This example shows the syntax for an explicitly typed range variable. ```csharp from int i in objects ``` ```vb From i As Integer In objects ``` 使用查询`select`子句来执行其他转换类型, 如隐式数值转换。Use the `select` clause of a query to perform other conversion types, like the implicit numeric conversions. 下面的示例使用`Cast`方法`select`和语句将一系列装箱的整数转换为双精度序列。The following example uses both the `Cast` method and a `select` statement to convert a sequence of boxed integers to a sequence of doubles. ```csharp IEnumerable sequence = Enumerable.Range(0, 10); var doubles = from int item in sequence select (double)item; ``` ```vb Dim sequence As IEnumerable = Enumerable.Range(0, 10) Dim doubles = From item As Integer In sequence Select CType(item, Double) ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在上启用标准查询运算符。The following code example demonstrates how to use to enable the use of the standard query operators on an . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#19)]

[!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#20)] 连接两个序列的另一种方法是构造一个集合 (例如数组), 然后应用方法, 并向其传递标识选择器函数。An alternative way of concatenating two sequences is to construct a collection, for example an array, of sequences and then apply the method, passing it the identity selector function. 下面的示例演示了的这种用法。The following example demonstrates this use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`source` `Contains`实现的类型, 则调用该实现中的方法来获取结果。If the type of `source` implements , the `Contains` method in that implementation is invoked to obtain the result. 否则, 此方法将确定`source`是否包含指定的元素。Otherwise, this method determines whether `source` contains the specified element. 如果找到匹配的元素, 则枚举将立即终止。Enumeration is terminated as soon as a matching element is found. 通过使用默认的相等比较器, 将元素与指定的值进行比较。Elements are compared to the specified value by using the default equality comparer, . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来确定数组是否包含特定元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine whether an array contains a specific element. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#30)] 下面的代码示例演示方法的可能应用。The following code example demonstrates a possible application of the method. 方法应用于字符串数组的集合。The method is applied to a collection of string arrays. 仅当该数组包含四个或多个元素时, 才会将集合中的每个数组的元素添加到结果中。The elements of each array in the collection are added to the resulting only if that array contains four or more elements. 用于生成种子值 , 因为如果集合中的数组没有四个或更多元素, 则只返回空序列。 is used to generate the seed value for because if no array in the collection has four or more elements, only the empty sequence is returned. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 默认的相等比较器用于比较类型的值。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types. 若要比较自定义数据类型, 需要重写 和方法, 还可以选择实现自定义类型中的泛型接口。To compare a custom data type, you need to override the and the methods, and optionally implement the generic interface in the custom type. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`Except(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`方法来比较两个数值序列, 并返回仅出现在第一个序列中的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `Except(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` method to compare two sequences of numbers and return elements that appear only in the first sequence. [!code-csharp-interactive[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#34)] 如果要比较某种自定义数据类型的对象序列, 则必须在 helper 类中实现泛型接口。If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helper class. 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口并重写和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and override and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#9)] 实现此接口后, 可以`ProductA` `Except(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`在方法中使用对象序列, 如以下示例中所示:After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the `Except(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` method, as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. > [!NOTE] > 有关的`GroupBy`示例, 请参阅以下文章:For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following articles: > > - > - > - 方法返回对象的集合, 每个对象对应于遇到的每个非重复键。 The method returns a collection of objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered. 是一个 , 它还具有与其元素关联的键。An is an that also has a key associated with its elements. 根据生成每个`source` 对象的第一个键的中的元素的顺序, 按顺序生成对象。The objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each . 分组中的元素将按它们出现`source`的顺序生成。Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`. 使用默认的相等比较器对键进行比较。The default equality comparer is used to compare keys. 在查询表达式语法中, `group by` (视觉C#对象) `Group By Into`或 (Visual Basic) 子句转换为对的调用。In query expression syntax, a `group by` (Visual C#) or `Group By Into` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . 有关详细信息和用法示例, 请参阅[group 子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md)和[group by 子句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)。For more information and usage examples, see [group clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md) and [Group By Clause](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. > [!NOTE] > 有关的`GroupBy`示例, 请参阅以下文章:For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following articles: > > - > - > - 方法返回对象的集合, 每个对象对应于遇到的每个非重复键。 The method returns a collection of objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered. 是一个 , 它还具有与其元素关联的键。An is an that also has a key associated with its elements. 根据生成每个`source` 对象的第一个键的中的元素的顺序, 按顺序生成对象。The objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each . 分组中的元素将按它们出现`source`的顺序生成。Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`. 如果`comparer` 为`null`, 则使用默认的相等比较器对键进行比较。If `comparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer is used to compare keys. 如果根据`comparer`, 两个键被视为相等, 则选择第一个键作为该分组的键。If two keys are considered equal according to `comparer`, the first key is chosen as the key for that grouping. 在查询表达式语法中, `group by` (视觉C#对象) `Group By Into`或 (Visual Basic) 子句转换为对的调用。In query expression syntax, a `group by` (Visual C#) or `Group By Into` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . 有关详细信息和用法示例, 请参阅[group 子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md)和[group by 子句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)。For more information and usage examples, see [group clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md) and [Group By Clause](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 默认的相等比较器用于对键进行哈希处理和比较。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 生成分层结果, 这意味着中`outer`的元素与中`inner`匹配元素的集合配对。 produces hierarchical results, which means that elements from `outer` are paired with collections of matching elements from `inner`. `GroupJoin`使您能够基于的每个元素`outer`的整个匹配项集生成结果。`GroupJoin` enables you to base your results on a whole set of matches for each element of `outer`. > [!NOTE] > 如果的给定`inner` `outer`元素在中没有关联元素, 则该元素的匹配序列将为空, 但仍会出现在结果中。If there are no correlated elements in `inner` for a given element of `outer`, the sequence of matches for that element will be empty but will still appear in the results. 对于每个`outer`元素, 只调用一次`inner` `outer` 函数,同时为所有元素的集合`resultSelector`与元素匹配。The `resultSelector` function is called only one time for each `outer` element together with a collection of all the `inner` elements that match the `outer` element. 这不同于方法, 在此方法中, 将对包含一个`outer`元素的对和中的一个元素`inner`调用结果选择器函数。This differs from the method, in which the result selector function is invoked on pairs that contain one element from `outer` and one element from `inner`. `GroupJoin`保留的元素`outer`的顺序, 并为的每个`outer`元素保留中匹配元素`inner`的顺序。`GroupJoin` preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each element of `outer`, the order of the matching elements from `inner`. 在传统的关系数据库术语中没有直接等效项。 has no direct equivalent in traditional relational database terms. 但是, 此方法实现了内部联接和左外部联接的超集。However, this method does implement a superset of inner joins and left outer joins. 这两个操作都可以使用分组联接来编写。Both of these operations can be written in terms of a grouped join. 请参阅[联接操作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). 在查询表达式语法中, `join … into` (视觉C#对象) `Group Join`或 (Visual Basic) 子句转换为对的调用。In query expression syntax, a `join … into` (Visual C#) or `Group Join` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对两个序列执行分组联接。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a grouped join on two sequences. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 两个集 A 和 B 的交集被定义为包含中的所有元素的集合, 这些元素也出现在 B 中, 但没有其他元素。The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements. 枚举此方法返回的对象时, `Intersect`会按它们`first`出现的顺序产生两个序列中的非重复元素。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, `Intersect` yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`. 默认的相等比较器用于比较类型的值。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types. 若要比较自定义数据类型, 需要重写 和方法, 还可以选择实现自定义类型中的泛型接口。To compare a custom data type, you need to override the and the methods, and optionally implement the generic interface in the custom type. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`Intersect(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`来返回出现在两个整数序列中的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use `Intersect(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` to return the elements that appear in each of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp-interactive[System.Linq.Enumerable#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#41)] 如果要比较某种自定义数据类型的对象序列, 则必须在 helper 类中实现泛型接口。If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helper class. 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口并重写和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and override and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#9)] 实现此接口后, 可以`ProductA` `Intersect`在方法中使用对象序列, 如以下示例中所示:After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the `Intersect` method, as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#10)] [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 默认的相等比较器用于对键进行哈希处理和比较。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 联接是指基于公共键关联两个信息源的元素的操作。A join refers to the operation of correlating the elements of two sources of information based on a common key. 在一个方法调用中将两个信息源和这些信息源与它们相匹配。 brings the two information sources and the keys by which they are matched together in one method call. 这不同于的使用`SelectMany`, 后者要求多个方法调用来执行相同的操作。This differs from the use of `SelectMany`, which requires more than one method call to perform the same operation. 保留的元素`outer`和每个元素的顺序, 以及的匹配`inner`元素的顺序。 preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each of these elements, the order of the matching elements of `inner`. 在查询表达式语法中, `join` (视觉C#对象) `Join`或 (Visual Basic) 子句转换为对的调用。In query expression syntax, a `join` (Visual C#) or `Join` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . 在关系数据库术语中, 此方法实现内部同等联接。In relational database terms, the method implements an inner equijoin. "内部" 表示结果中只包括具有其他序列中的匹配项的元素。'Inner' means that only elements that have a match in the other sequence are included in the results. "同等联接" 是一种联接, 其中的键进行比较以确定是否相等。An 'equijoin' is a join in which the keys are compared for equality. 左外部联接操作没有专用的标准查询运算符, 但可以通过使用方法来执行。A left outer join operation has no dedicated standard query operator, but can be performed by using the method. 请参阅[联接操作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用基于公共键对两个序列执行内部联接。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#42)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的`null`默认值为。The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`. 方法不提供指定默认值的方法。The method does not provide a way to specify a default value. 如果要指定之外的默认值`default(TSource)`, 请使用 "示例" 部分中所述的方法。If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the method as described in the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对空数组使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use on an empty array. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#45)] 有时, 如果集合`default(TSource)`不包含任何元素, 则的值将不是要使用的默认值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 您可以使用方法来指定要在集合为空时使用的默认值, 而不是检查不需要的默认值的结果, 并在必要时对其进行更改。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然后, 调用以获取最后一个元素。Then, call to obtain the last element. 下面的代码示例使用这两种方法来获取默认值 1 (如果该月中的数字天数集合为空)。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty. 由于整数的默认值为 0 (不对应于月中的任何一天), 因此必须将默认值指定为1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查询执行完毕后, 将检查第一个结果变量是否存在不需要的默认值。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing. 第二个结果变量通过使用来指定默认值1。The second result variable is obtained by using to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法只返回中`source`可强制转换为类型`TResult`的元素。 The method returns only those elements in `source` that can be cast to type `TResult`. 若要改为在元素无法强制转换为类型`TResult`时接收异常, 请使用。 To instead receive an exception if an element cannot be cast to type `TResult`, use . 此方法是一些标准查询运算符方法, 可应用于具有非参数化类型的集合, 例如。This method is one of the few standard query operator methods that can be applied to a collection that has a non-parameterized type, such as an . 这是因为扩展了类型。This is because extends the type . 只能应用于基于参数化类型的集合, 而不能应用于基于非参数化类型的集合。 cannot only be applied to collections that are based on the parameterized type, but collections that are based on the non-parameterized type also. 通过将应用到实现的集合, 可以通过使用标准查询运算符来查询集合。By applying to a collection that implements , you gain the ability to query the collection by using the standard query operators. 例如, 指定的类型参数将返回 Visual Basic 中的类型C# `IEnumerable(Of Object)` `IEnumerable

span.span: Sorts the elements of a sequence in ascending order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按元素本身的值对序列进行排序,`x => x`请为`keySelector`指定标识函数 (在C#视觉`Function(x) x`对象中或在 Visual Basic 中)。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 定义了两个方法来扩展类型, 该类型是此方法的返回类型。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 使用这两种方法`ThenBy` ( `ThenByDescending`即和), 您可以指定其他排序条件以对序列进行排序。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`还`ThenBy` `ThenByDescending`返回, 这意味着对或的任意连续调用都可以进行。 `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 由于继承自, 因此可以对 、 或调用的结果调用或。 Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 这样做会引入一个新的主要顺序, 该顺序将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此方法使用默认比较器对键进行比较。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 此方法执行稳定排序;也就是说, 如果两个元素的键相等, 则会保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反, 不稳定排序不会保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查询表达式语法中, `orderby` (视觉C#对象) `Order By`或 (Visual Basic) 子句转换为对的调用。In query expression syntax, an `orderby` (Visual C#) or `Order By` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对序列中的元素进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use to sort the elements of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. `selector`表示要处理的元素的第一个参数。The first argument to `selector` represents the element to process. 第二个参数`selector` , 用于表示源序列中该元素的从零开始的索引。The second argument to `selector` represents the zero-based index of that element in the source sequence. 例如, 如果元素处于已知顺序, 并且你想要对特定索引处的元素执行某些操作, 则这会很有用。This can be useful if the elements are in a known order and you want to do something with an element at a particular index, for example. 如果要检索一个或多个元素的索引, 此方法也会很有用。It can also be useful if you want to retrieve the index of one or more elements. 此投影方法要求转换函数`selector`为源`source`序列中的每个值生成一个值。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`返回本身为集合的值, 则由使用者手动遍历个子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually. 在这种情况下, 你的查询将返回值的单个合并序列可能更好。In such a situation, it might be better for your query to return a single coalesced sequence of values. 若要实现此目的, 请使用方法而不是。To achieve this, use the method instead of . 尽管`SelectMany`的工作方式`Select`类似于, 但它的不同之处在于, 转换函数返回一个集合`SelectMany` , 然后在返回之前扩展。Although `SelectMany` works similarly to `Select`, it differs in that the transform function returns a collection that is then expanded by `SelectMany` before it is returned. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法枚举输入序列, 使用转换函数将每个元素映射到, 然后枚举并生成每个此类对象的元素。 The method enumerates the input sequence, uses a transform function to map each element to an , and then enumerates and yields the elements of each such object. 也就是说, `selector`将调用的每个`source`元素, 并返回一个值序列。That is, for each element of `source`, `selector` is invoked and a sequence of values is returned. 然后, 将这一二维集合合并为一维并返回它。 then flattens this two-dimensional collection of collections into a one-dimensional and returns it. 例如, 如果查询使用获取数据库中每个客户的订单 (类型`Order`为), 则结果为类型`IEnumerable`为C#或`IEnumerable(Of Order)` Visual Basic 中。For example, if a query uses to obtain the orders (of type `Order`) for each customer in a database, the result is of type `IEnumerable` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of Order)` in Visual Basic. 如果查询使用来获取订单, 则不会合并订单集合的集合, 结果类型`IEnumerable>`为C#或`IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))` Visual Basic 中。If instead the query uses to obtain the orders, the collection of collections of orders is not combined and the result is of type `IEnumerable>` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))` in Visual Basic. 在查询表达式语法中, `from`第一个子句C#(Visual `From` ) 或子句 (Visual Basic) 在第一次后转换为对的调用。In query expression syntax, each `from` clause (Visual C#) or `From` clause (Visual Basic) after the initial one translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对数组执行一对多投影。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 当必须将`source`中的元素保留在调用后发生的查询逻辑范围中时, 方法非常有用。The method is useful when you have to keep the elements of `source` in scope for query logic that occurs after the call to . 有关代码示例，请参见“示例”部分。See the Example section for a code example. 如果`TSource`类型的对象与类型`TCollection`的对象之间存在双向关系, 即, 如果类型`TCollection`的对象提供了属性来检索`TSource`生成它的对象, 则不需要此的重载。If there is a bidirectional relationship between objects of type `TSource` and objects of type `TCollection`, that is, if an object of type `TCollection` provides a property to retrieve the `TSource` object that produced it, you do not need this overload of . 相反, 你可以通过 `TCollection`对象使用并`TSource`向后导航到对象。Instead, you can use and navigate back to the `TSource` object through the `TCollection` object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法并行枚举两个源序列, 并通过使用的默认相等`TSource`比较器比较对应的元素。 `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`The `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` method enumerates the two source sequences in parallel and compares corresponding elements by using the default equality comparer for `TSource`, . 默认的相等比较器用于比较类型的值。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types. 若要比较自定义数据类型, 需要重写 和方法, 还可以选择实现自定义类型中的泛型接口。To compare a custom data type, you need to override the and the methods, and optionally implement the generic interface in the custom type. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`确定两个序列是否相等。The following code examples demonstrate how to use `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` to determine whether two sequences are equal. 在前两个示例中, 方法确定比较序列是否包含对同一对象的引用。In the first two examples, the method determines whether the compared sequences contain references to the same objects. 在第三个和第四个示例中, 方法比较序列内对象的实际数据。In the third and fourth examples, the method compares the actual data of the objects within the sequences. 在此示例中, 序列是相等的。In this example the sequences are equal. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#32)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#32)] 下面的代码示例比较两个不相等的序列。The following code example compares two sequences that are not equal. 请注意, 序列包含相同的数据, 但由于它们包含的对象具有不同的引用, 因此序列不被视为相等。Note that the sequences contain identical data, but because the objects that they contain have different references, the sequences are not considered equal. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#33)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#33)] 如果要比较序列中对象的实际数据, 而不只是比较它们的引用, 则必须在类中实现泛型接口。If you want to compare the actual data of the objects in the sequences instead of just comparing their references, you have to implement the generic interface in your class. 下面的代码示例演示如何在帮助器类中实现此接口并提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a helper class and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#9)] 实现此接口后, 可以`ProductA` `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`在方法中使用对象序列, 如以下示例中所示:After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` method, as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#8)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 如果`source`包含的元素`count`少于个, 则返回空。If `source` contains fewer than `count` elements, an empty is returned. 如果`count`小于或等于零, 则会生成的`source`所有元素。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, all elements of `source` are yielded. 和方法是函数补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个整数`n`, 串联的`coll.Take(n)`结果, 并`coll.Skip(n)`生成与相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中, `Skip`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用跳过已排序数组中指定数目的元素, 并返回剩余的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip a specified number of elements in a sorted array and return the remaining elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用延迟执行实现的。The method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此方法使用`source` `predicate`测试的每个元素, 并在结果为时`true`跳过元素。This method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 谓词函数为元素返回`false`后, 将生成该元素和中`source`的其余元素, 并且不`predicate`会再对调用。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`为`true`序列中的所有元素返回, 则返回空。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 和方法是函数补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p` `coll.TakeWhile(p)` , 串联的结果, 并`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成与相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中, `Skip While`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在条件为 true 的情况下, 如何使用跳过数组的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#88)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#88)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法使用`source`测试的每个元素, 并在结果为时`true`跳过元素。 `predicate` The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 谓词函数为元素返回`false`后, 将生成该元素和中`source`的其余元素, 并且不`predicate`会再对调用。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`为`true`序列中的所有元素返回, 则返回空。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 的`predicate`第一个参数表示要测试的元素。The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test. 第二个参数表示中`source`元素的从零开始的索引。The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`. 和方法是函数补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p` `coll.TakeWhile(p)` , 串联的结果, 并`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成与相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中, `Skip While`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来跳过数组中的元素, 前提是该元素的索引为 true。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition that depends on the element's index is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 枚举`source`并生成元素, `count`直到元素已生成或`source`不包含其他元素。 enumerates `source` and yields elements until `count` elements have been yielded or `source` contains no more elements. 如果`count`超过中`source`的元素数, 则返回的`source`所有元素。If `count` exceeds the number of elements in `source`, all elements of `source` are returned. 如果`count`小于或等于零, `source`则不会枚举, 并返回空 。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, `source` is not enumerated and an empty is returned. 和方法是函数补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个整数`n`, 串联的`coll.Take(n)`结果, 并`coll.Skip(n)`生成与相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中, `Take`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Take` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从序列的开头返回元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法使用`source`测试的每个元素, 并在结果为时`true`生成元素。 `predicate` The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and yields the element if the result is `true`. 当谓词函数为元素返回`false`或不包含其他元素时`source` , 枚举停止。Enumeration stops when the predicate function returns `false` for an element or when `source` contains no more elements. 和方法是函数补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p` `coll.TakeWhile(p)` , 串联的结果, 并`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成与相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中, `Take While`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Take While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示当条件为 true 时, 如何使用从序列的开头返回元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按元素本身的值对序列进行排序,`x => x`请为`keySelector`指定标识函数 (在C#视觉`Function(x) x`对象中或在 Visual Basic 中)。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 和被定义为扩展类型, 这也是这些方法的返回类型。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此设计使你可以通过应用任意数量或方法来指定多个排序条件。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 由于继承自, 因此可以对 、 或调用的结果调用或。 Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 这样做会引入一个新的主要顺序, 该顺序将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此方法使用默认比较器对键进行比较。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 此方法执行稳定排序;也就是说, 如果两个元素的键相等, 则会保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反, 不稳定排序不会保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查询表达式语法中, `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` (视觉C#对象) `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]`或 (Visual Basic) 子句转换为对的调用。In query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual C#) or `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对序列中的元素执行次要排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence. span.span: An whose elements are sorted in descending order according to a key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按元素本身的值对序列进行排序,`x => x`请为`keySelector`指定标识函数 (在C#视觉`Function(x) x`对象中或在 Visual Basic 中)。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 和被定义为扩展类型, 这也是这些方法的返回类型。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此设计使你可以通过应用任意数量或方法来指定多个排序条件。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 由于继承自, 因此可以对 、 或调用的结果调用或。 Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 这样做会引入一个新的主要顺序, 该顺序将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此排序方法使用默认比较器对键进行比较。This sorting method compares keys by using the default comparer . 此方法执行稳定排序;也就是说, 如果两个元素的键相等, 则会保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反, 不稳定排序不会保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在 Visual C# query 表达式语法中, `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual C# query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending` clause translates to an invocation of . 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中, `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending`子句转换为对的调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, an `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending` clause translates to an invocation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此方法排除返回集中的重复项。This method excludes duplicates from the return set. 这与方法不同, 后者返回输入序列中的所有元素, 包括重复项。This is different behavior to the method, which returns all the elements in the input sequences including duplicates. 默认的相等比较器用于比较实现泛型接口的类型的值。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较自定义数据类型, 需要实现此接口, 并为类型提供自己的和方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. 枚举此方法返回的对象时, `Union`按该顺序枚举`second` `first`并生成每个尚未生成的元素。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, `Union` enumerates `first` and `second` in that order and yields each element that has not already been yielded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`来获取两个整数序列的并集。The following code example demonstrates how to use `Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` to obtain the union of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp-interactive[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#109)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#109)] 如果要比较某种自定义数据类型的对象序列, 则必须在 helper 类中实现泛型接口。If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helper class. 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口并重写和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and override and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#9)] 实现此接口后, 可以`ProductA` `Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`在方法中使用对象序列, 如以下示例中所示:After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the `Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` method, as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#10)] [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象, 该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行, 方法是直接调用其`GetEnumerator`方法, 或者通过在`foreach`视觉C#对象中`For Each`或在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法将第一个序列的每个元素与第二个序列中具有相同索引的元素合并在一起。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列不具有相同数量的元素, 则方法将合并序列, 直到它到达其中一个的结尾。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如, 如果一个序列包含三个元素, 另一个序列具有四个元素, 则结果序列将只有三个元素。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the result sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来合并两个序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#200)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#200)]
